The Billhooks moved against The Foundation. This faction now considers The Billhooks, at War and This faction will go out of its way to hurt The Billhooks even if itâ€™s not in their best interest to do so. They expect The Billhooks to do the same, and take precautions against The Billhooks.
Spirit Wardens moved against The Dimmer Sisters. This faction now considers Spirit Wardens, Helpful and This faction will help Spirit Wardens if it causes no problems or significant cost for them. They expect the same from Spirit Wardens.
Inspectors moved against Bluecoats. This faction now considers Inspectors, Neutral and This faction has other concerns than Inspectors
